definition: a shelf beside an open fire where something can be kept warm, cut with a hob
details:
noun
- a shelf beside an open fire where something can be kept warm
- a hard steel edge tool used to cut gears
- (folklore) fairies that are somewhat mischievous
= synonyms: brownie, elf, gremlin, pixie, pixy, imp
- (folklore) a small grotesque supernatural creature that makes trouble for human beings
= synonyms: hobgoblin, goblin
verb
- cut with a hob
